title: 820-2849 fans run at full speed when the battery is attached
message: the efi and OS diagnostics both passed.  the only strange thing that i notice is that chgr_bgate  is 0.9v and it charges really slow.  u7000 has been replaced several times and q6910 was replaced

title: 820-2849 fans run at full speed when the battery is attached
message:
Post exact resistance between pins 17/18 of U7000.
Check R7050/51/52 and traces.

title: 820-2849 fans run at full speed when the battery is attached
message: 2.7 ohms.

title: 820-2849 fans run at full speed when the battery is attached
message: chgr_bgate is 8.3v  when there is no battery and .9v with a battery. the fan runs normal without battery attached and it runs full speed with a battery

title: 820-2849 fans run at full speed when the battery is attached
message:
CHGR_BGATE is good.
Check CHGR_BGATE_R and CHGR_OVP_A.

title: 820-2849 fans run at full speed when the battery is attached
message:
chgr_bgate_r is 8.3v with the battery disconnected and 0.9v with the battery connected
chgr_ovp_a is 0v  with or without the battery
today i replaced the smc  and the fan ramps up and is still loud with the battery attached
it still passes the diagnostics

title: 820-2849 fans run at full speed when the battery is attached
message:
Exact PPBUS_G3H voltage w/ and w/o battery connected?

Test the machine disconnecting BIL (J6995), with battery.

title: 820-2849 fans run at full speed when the battery is attached
message: 8.28v with the battery. 8.39 without the battery

title: 820-2849 fans run at full speed when the battery is attached
message:

Still not working properly?

BTW, did you test with known good battery?

Machine turns on with battery, without charger?

title: 820-2849 fans run at full speed when the battery is attached

title: 820-2849 fans run at full speed when the battery is attached
message: Run HWMonitor and post a picture with its report...

title: 820-2849 fans run at full speed when the battery is attached
message: hmmm

title: 820-2849 fans run at full speed when the battery is attached
message:
Check current and voltage sensors, at pages 50/51; especially DCIN and BMON current.
Be sure R7050/51/52 and their traces are good.

title: 820-2849 fans run at full speed when the battery is attached
message: after letting the computer run for a while the fans slow down
